snippet: In a self-published book, Gary Heyward tells of how he sold cigarettes and drugs to Rikers Island prisoners and wound up a prisoner himself.
abstract: In a self-published book, Gary Heyward tells of how he sold cigarettes and drugs to Rikers Island prisoners and wound up a prisoner himself.

headline.main: A Jail Guard's Tale of His Journey to Inmate
headline.print_headline: A Former Jail Guard’s Tale of His Journey to the Other Side of the Bars
